This is a BRAND NEW burger joint and poutinery that just opened up on Papineau, close to Mont Royal. I was craving a burger big time for lunch one day, so I decided to check it out. The guys working behind the counter are pretty friendly and I hope they do well with the business. But my first tip is: don't just recook fries that have been already cooked and sitting around, even if the business is new and doesn't yet have a whole lot of traffic (and thus french fry turnover). I would have appreciated fresh fries, even if I did just get the side fries with my burger. Our burgers were really good - just good ole hearty beef burgers with your basic toppings (tomato, lettuce, etc) and a choice of sauce. I had the dijonnaise and my manfriend had the spicy sauce. The spicy sauce was not at all spicy by our standards, but we're pretty hardcore cayenne lovers.  With the state of the fries I received, I doubt I'd be inclined to go in for a poutine any time soon, but I would grab a burger there again.

J'adore ce petit Resto! Simple, à bon prix et goûteux. À chaque fois c'est un défi de ne choisir qu'un seul sandwich (et La portion est grande) sans parler des choix de sauces maisons. Et le proprio est vraiment sympa.

Etant un fan de Kebab je me devais de venir tester ce spot. Je parle normalement d'un kebab servi dans un pain rond, ceux que l'on a plus l'habitude de manger en France. Chose faite ce soir en prenant un kebab.  Déjà c'est servi dans de la baguette, le pain est pas trop mal. La viande n'est pas assez goutu à mon sens et surtout pas assez grillée et c'est bien dommage. les accompagnements classiques de salade-tomate-oignons font le jeu. Mention spéciale à la sauce maison moitié mayo et moitié harissa qui m'a donné un brin de nostalgie.  Il y a d'autres choix de sandwich, pourquoi pas avec de la merguez la prochaine fois ! J'en ai eu pour 6.9$ pour le kebab sans frite, pour ajouter les frites mettre 1$ de plus et c'est servi dans le kebab. La portion est pas mal.  En conclusion c'est pas mauvais c'est pas exceptionnelle mais on peut y retourner car c'est pratique au niveau des horaires d'ouverture, le patron est cool et ca fait la job :)

I first tried this place about a month and a half ago and I've already been back 4 times. Mind you I've only had the burgers and tacos but they're good enough to write home about (seriously, I emailed my mom yesterday about upholstery and I mentioned these burgers)  More on the Burger:  What I think makes this worth coming back for is the simple combination of the essentials. The buns are toasted in the best way, the patty is delicious without being greasy, the toppings are pretty basic but you can pick your sauce that ties the whole thing together. My last two visits had be ordering a pair of burgers (because I was famished AND I'm a glutton!) and both times I had to keep the second burger for another meal; one burger is so fulfilling, you'll want to experience it again the next day. (day old burgers from this place are also tasty)
Really good place to take a kebab. Good portions and price! Will definitely come back
